title: Grassroots Natural Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Raw, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe attached to a health food store. Offers a large selection of food including burritos, soups, salads, sandwiches, wraps and hot entrees, of which some are vegan. Has specialty vegan jackfruit tamales around Christmas and Cinco de Mayo that you order in advance.
